name: d20: Sweet Roll Club
storyline:
Tomoko may lack social skills and good grades, but there’s one thing she surely has no lack of – her vivid imagination. She uses it to change boring everyday places into something magical: the school’s backyard turns into a thick dark forest with dormant dragons, the library - into a dreadful warlock citadel and the hallways twist into mazes you would see in an ancient dungeon... Yes, extremely silly fantasies for an average high school girl.

One day, Tomoko finds out about other girls in her school that imagine themselves to be brave warriors, powerful wizards or righteous paladins. Together, they decide to form a Tabletop RPG club, where they will finally be able to quench their thirst for magic and adventure.
